trans:
TMI
Not long ago, Rita and I went to Wolmido. We went to an amusement park where I rode the Viking, bumper cars, and the hurricane ride..
I even rode the bumper car alone, and it made me mad.
It was my first time riding it, but I couldnâ€™t drive, so I kept hitting the walls. When the employee saw me struggling and helped me, I promised myself
I would never ride the bumper car alone again. Hahaha!
Afterward, we went to the beach and lay down,
watching the sunset. I filmed a moment of just staring at the water,
and when I watched it again, even though we were doing nothing, we both looked so happy.
The sea was so beautiful.
I put the mat away for a while and ordered chicken, fries, and rosÃ© tteokbokki with Rita. We ate it so deliciously. Then we went back to the beach
and took a walk while listening to music on a speaker. It was such a healing time, especially when we took pictures with Ritaâ€™s camera. I definitely want to go again with Rita, haha.
I recently bought a scarf. I bought it in pink, sky blue, and white, and Iâ€™m really proud of myself for picking the one that doesnâ€™t shed fur.
I also changed the scent of my hand cream after a long time.
I love the subtle scent,
so I think I apply it 2-3 times a day ğŸŒ¸
Let me tell you what Iâ€™m into these days!
First, Iâ€™ve really been into checkered items. From checkered shirts to hats!
